title: Crocodile Dundee
writer: Paul Hogan, Ken Shadie, John Cornell
actors: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon
plot: An American reporter travels to the Australian outback to meet eccentric poacher Mick "Crocodile" Dundee and invites him to New York City, where he comes face-to-face with the complexities of modern life.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 3 wins & 12 nominations total
